Documentation.UserDocu:
capture(options = None) -- capture the current view with given option
options: an optional list of possible flags including * 'Visibilities': capture objects visibilities * 'ShowOnTop': restore show-on-top objects * 'Camera': capture camera settings * 'Shadow': capture shadow draw style settings * 'Clippings': capture clip plane settings * 'All': capture all settings
If options is not given, it captures all settings enabled by various 'SaveXXX' properties.

Methode.Name: apply
Methode.Documentation:
apply(options = None) -- restore the captured view
options: an optional list of possible flags including * 'Visibilities': restore objects visibilities * 'ShowOnTop': restore show-on-top objects * 'Camera': restore camera settings * 'Shadow': restore shadow draw style settings * 'Clippings': crestore clip plane settings * 'All': restore all settings
If options is not given, it restores settings enabled by various 'SaveXXX' properties.
